title: Bountiful Beer Bread Suggestions
suggestions: For 'watermelon' bread, replace beer with Mountain Dew Code Red; add chocolate chips
Make gifts by dividing batter between three foil mini loaf pans; bake 35-40 minutes. Cool; wrap in colored plastic
Mix 1/2 cup chopped pepperoni, 1 Tbsp Garlic Garlic and 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese into batter before baking
Toast and top with fried egg and sliced cheese
For spice bread, add 12 oz root beer, 1/2 cup molasses and 1 tsp pumpkin pie spice in place of beer
For delicious French toast, dip bread slices into a mixture of eggs, cream and cinnamon; saute in butter
